sect2.title: Installation of Ncurses
sect2.para: Install Ncurses by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: ./configure --prefix=/usr --with-shared && make && make install && chmod 755 /usr/lib/*.&ncurses-version; && mv /usr/lib/libncurses.so.5* /lib && ln -sf libncurses.a /usr/lib/libcurses.a && ln -sf ../../lib/libncurses.so.5 /usr/lib/libncurses.so && ln -sf ../../lib/libncurses.so.5 /usr/lib/libcurses.so
